title: Challah for the bread machine
ingredients: ['250ml warm water (45 degrees C)', '1 1/2 teaspoons salt', '2 tablespoons caster sugar', '60g pareve margarine', '1 egg', '375g bread flour', '2 1/4 teaspoons bread machine yeast', 'Glaze', '1 egg', '1 tablespoon water', '1/8 teaspoon vanilla extract']
